ai-iti95:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti95:2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three ways of being provided with sensual pleasures.
ai-iti95:2.3_0: Living in disrepute, discontent, and sloped, saying:
ai-iti95:2.4_0: These are the three ways of being provided with sensual pleasures.”
ai-iti95:3.2_0: Gods Who Control the Creations of Others,
ai-iti95:3.4_0: and others who indulge in sensual pleasures—
ai-iti95:4.2_0: in sensual indulgence, an astute person
ai-iti95:5.1_0: Having cut the stream so hard to pass,
ai-iti95:5.2_0: that’s tied to pleasant seeming things,
ai-iti95:6.1_0: He knows the noble ones, knowledge master,
ai-iti95:6.2_0: the astute do regard them well,
ai-iti95:6.3_0: by understanding the end of rebirth,
ai-iti95:6.4_0: they don’t come back to future lives.”
ai-iti95:7.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
